skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill

Developer Terms of Use
des: In this skill,I will be discussing various nuances of the language of Telugu at regular intervals. This is to make the language more interesting and the linsterners to feel more attached to its roots, beauty, grammar, linguistic shades, poetry, literatures and history.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
